description:
Goal Setting : It is time to set goals you can FOLLOW

FORGET ABOUT NEW YEAR'S RESOLUTIONS. They never work !

Let's be honest.

You started this week (or month or year) with very good intentions.

You were going to lose weight, write that book, start that blog and move to paradise.

B-u-t, things have not exactly panned out have they ?

Alright, let's not put ourselves in self-pity prison.

IT IS FINALLY TIME.

Time to set realistic and doable goals and passionately follow through with them.

In this course, you will learn :

  • The secrets of high-achieving people who seem to never miss a beat (and how you can become like them)
  • Why your goals SHOULD NOT be about you & how that will move you faster towards you actually getting things done
  • A simple system that allows you to break down your goals into digestible, actionable steps so that you don't get overwhelmed.
  • Practical strategies to help you FOCUS on accomplishing what matters to you the most.

Also included ...

A work-book you can print out so you can follow along closely as you go through the video presentations (you can even create a binder to keep track of what you've written and revisit it as and when you need to) + I will be available via the Discussions Section to encourage, motivate and answer any questions you may have.

I invite you, my friend, to click on the "Take this Course" button up there so I can help you finally get "it" done.

P.S

There's a 30-day money-back guarantee. So you can take the WHOLE course and ask for your money back and we'll still be friends. It's a WIN-WIN, really.

* Even if you don't take this course, the accompanying workbook is yours free to keep. Go ahead and download it from the course dashboard.*

P.P.S

I will be adding fresh and exciting content and updates from time to time at no extra charge. Watch out for them.
title: Goal Setting : It is time to set goals you can FOLLOW
